ch0162_00_koki/0101_0701_02_10: I hope we get to meet a lot of sync pairs today!
ch0162_00_koki/0601_0701_01_10:
Lots of sync pairs came to Pasio from a bunch of
different regions!
ch0162_00_koki/0601_0701_02_10:
Every day is so exciting because I get to see
Pokémon that I can’t find in Sinnoh!
ch0162_00_koki/0601_0701_03_10:
I can learn a lot from meeting new Trainers, so
I’m really glad I came here!
ch0162_00_koki/0601_0701_04_10:
I’m gonna do my best both as a Trainer and as
Professor Rowan’s assistant!
ch0162_00_koki/0602_0701_01_10:
I’ve been helping out Professor Rowan as
his assistant.
ch0162_00_koki/0602_0701_02_10:
He’s been conducting research and giving talks
about Pokémon Evolution!
ch0162_00_koki/0602_0701_03_10:
One day, I want to be as knowledgeable
about Pokémon as he is!
ch0162_00_koki/0603_0701_01_10:
I have a friend who’s also trying to complete her
Pokédex! Her name is Dawn.
ch0162_00_koki/0603_0701_02_10:
She’s so reliable! We worked together to get out
of a bunch of tight spots back when we were
exploring Sinnoh.
ch0162_00_koki/0603_0701_03_10:
If you ever need help with something here on
Pasio, we’d be happy to help! You can count
on us!
ch0162_00_koki/0604_0701_01_10:
Guess what? I’ve developed my own theory about
Pokémon Evolution!
ch0162_00_koki/0604_0701_02_10:
Specifically, I think it’s a matter of how much the
Pokémon likes a certain thing!
ch0162_00_koki/0604_0701_03_10:
For example, spiky Pokémon evolved that way
because they really like having spikes and want to
show them off!
ch0162_00_koki/0604_0701_04_10:
What do you think? I think it’s a pretty decent
hypothesis, if I do say so myself!
ch0162_00_koki/0605_0701_01_10:
The same Pokémon will battle differently if it’s
raised by a different Trainer.
ch0162_00_koki/0605_0701_02_10:
That’s why battling with Pokémon can teach
you things that you can’t find in your Pokédex!
ch0162_00_koki/0605_0701_03_10:
You and your partner sure are different from other
sync pairs! Let me research you sometime!
ch0162_00_koki/1701_0701_01_10: How are you doing? I have a present for you!
ch0162_00_koki/1701_0701_02_10: I think you’ll find a good use for it!
ch0162_00_koki/1701_0702_01_10:
That’s a pretty good item, so I hope it helps
you out!
ch0162_00_koki/2501_0701_01_10:
There’s something I always think whenever I see 
you or Dawn.
ch0162_00_koki/2501_0701_02_10:
Namely, that it’s so important to strengthen your
bond with your partner Pokémon.
ch0162_00_koki/2501_0701_03_10:
I want to grow as a sync pair with my partner
Pokémon and deepen our bond!
ch0162_00_koki/2501_0702_01_10:
It’s tons of fun to hang out with you and Dawn
because I always learn a lot from the both of you.
ch0162_00_koki/2501_0702_02_10:
You’ve been awesome friends to me, and I sure
hope it stays that way!
ch0162_00_koki/2511_0701_01_10:
When I see you and your partner Pokémon, I
always think about what a great sync pair
you are.
ch0162_00_koki/2511_0701_02_10:
Here on Pasio, a Trainer and a Pokémon form a
special bond...
ch0162_00_koki/2511_0701_03_10:
It’s not just about being strong. You also have to
trust each other!
ch0162_00_koki/2511_0701_04_10:
I think you’re a great example of that! I really look
up to you as a sync pair!
ch0162_00_koki/2511_0702_01_10:
I’m gonna research sync pairs and report my
findings to Professor Rowan!
ch0162_00_koki/2511_0702_02_10:
I’d like you to teach me more about you and your
partner! You’re really the best sync pair I know!
ch0162_00_koki/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! I wonder what kind of Trainers and
Pokémon we’ll meet out there today!
ch0162_00_koki/3003_0701_01_10:
We gotta go everywhere and meet as many
Trainers as we can! I wanna learn everything!
ch0162_00_koki/3005_0701_01_10:
I should finalize my research notes before I
hit the hay.
